title: Getting reported for having a bad game
body:
I'm getting a little tired of these people in games reporting me for having a bad game. It happens more than once daily and to be honest takes away from anything positive I may get out of the game.

Case in point...

I go 7/12/8 with Lucian and have 106 cs for entire game cause I couldn't farm against an aggressive bot lane Ashe.

The {{champion:92}}  in the game proceed to tell everyone to report me for being useless.

This is an everyday occurrance and is something that Riot as a whole needs to be aware of as it skews the reporting system into thinking someone was doing something on purpose.

replies.body: The community in League overall is toxic.  Its sad that such a great game is populated by such wastes of DNA.  Few if any ever get banned just try to keep your head above the grime and don't get tilted.
